page.title: 12Droitwich - Tourism
page.content: Droitwich also has a range of hotels. The Raven Hotel is built in a attractive 'black and white' style. The Worcs. Hotel is a huge hotel that has been rebuilt many times. It has a double-doored porch. Probably the most famous is the Chateau Impney. It is a unique hotel, with its soaring towers, mascard roof and classical French gardens. The Heritage Centre, which is the local information centre, is a converted Victorian Methodist Chapel. The centre contains a wide variety of exhibitions, including much information about Droitwich's past. There is usually some sort of special display.Droitwich High St. has an attractive range of older shops, while the more modern shopping precinct contains a wide range of modern shops.
